Metadata.title: AdInsights
Metadata.description: Collect, analyze, and visualize e-commerce ads to identify winning products.

hero.title: The Future of Ad Creation is Here
hero.subtitle: AdInsights combines cutting-edge AI with market analysis to help you create winning ad campaigns faster than ever.

features.title: All-in-One Marketing Intelligence
features.subtitle: From initial idea to performance analysis, AdInsights is your strategic partner.

winnerDiscovery.title: Winning Product Discovery
winnerDiscovery.description: Our AI wolf scours our ad database to unearth trending products and the strategies that make them succeed.

competitorSpy.title: Competitor Spy
competitorSpy.description: Deconstruct any competitor's ad or product page. Get their marketing angle, weaknesses, and counter-strategies.

instantConcepts.title: Instant Ad Concepts
instantConcepts.description: Generate complete, high-converting ad concepts—compelling copy paired with custom AI visuals—in seconds.

cta.title: Ready to Revolutionize Your Ads?
cta.subtitle: Stop guessing and start creating data-driven, AI-powered campaigns that convert.

FinderPage.title: Winning Product Discovery
FinderPage.description: Let our AI analyze our ad library to identify top-performing product categories and uncover the trends driving their success. This is the ideal tool to find your next market to conquer.

TrendsPage.title: Market Trend Analysis
TrendsPage.description: Discover the most sought-after products in any category. Enter a product category and region to get an AI-driven market analysis.

form.title: Analyze Market Trends
form.description: Tell the AI which product category and region you're interested in. It will provide a market summary, trending products, and strategic advice.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.description: The AI leverages its vast training on public web data up to its last update. By analyzing countless articles, product listings, and consumer discussions, it identifies patterns and synthesizes information to provide strategic insights on market trends, popular products, and potential risks. It does not access real-time sales data.

SpyPage.title: Competitor Spy
SpyPage.description: Deconstruct a specific competitor's marketing strategy. Enter their ad or product page URL to get a detailed analysis of their approach and effective counter-strategies.

GeneratePage.title: Ad Concept Generator
GeneratePage.description: Create high-conversion ad concepts in seconds. Provide your product details and let our AI generate compelling options for you, complete with visuals and audio.

form.title: Generate New Ad Concepts
form.description: Describe your product and target audience. The AI will generate three complete ad concepts, each with its own unique copy, visual, and audio.

AnalyzePage.title: Ad Performance Analysis
AnalyzePage.description: Get an AI-powered analysis of your ad creative. Upload your visual, provide the details, and receive an estimated engagement score and actionable feedback.

form.title: Analyze a New Ad
form.description: Provide the details of your ad below. The AI will analyze the copy, visual, and targeting to give you a performance estimate and suggestions for improvement.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.intro: This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You.

collection.title: Collecting and Using Your Personal Data

types.title: Types of Data Collected
types.content: While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide Us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify You. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to: Email address, First name and last name, Usage Data.

usage.title: Use of Your Personal Data
usage.content: The Company may use Personal Data for the following purposes: To provide and maintain our Service, including to monitor the usage of our Service. To manage Your Account: to manage Your registration as a user of the Service.

security.title: Security of Your Personal Data
security.content: The security of Your Personal Data is important to Us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect Your Personal Data, We cannot guarantee its absolute security.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us by email.

TermsPage.title: Terms of Use
TermsPage.intro: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using Our Service.

interpretation.title: Interpretation and Definitions
interpretation.subtitle: Interpretation
interpretation.content: The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.

acknowledgement.title: Acknowledgment
acknowledgement.content1: These are the Terms and Conditions governing the use of this Service and the agreement that operates between You and the Company. These Terms and Conditions set out the rights and obligations of all users regarding the use of the Service.
acknowledgement.content2: Your access to and use of the Service is conditioned on Your acceptance of and compliance with these Terms and Conditions. These Terms and Conditions apply to all visitors, users and others who access or use the Service.

links.title: Links to Other Websites
links.content1: Our Service may contain links to third-party web sites or services that are not owned or controlled by the Company.
links.content2: The Company has no control over, and assumes no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third party web sites or services. You further acknowledge and agree that the Company shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with the use of or reliance on any such content, goods or services available on or through any such web sites or services.

disclaimer.title: 'AS IS' and 'AS AVAILABLE' Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The Service is provided to You 'AS IS' and 'AS AVAILABLE' and with all faults and defects without warranty of any kind. To the maximum extent permitted under applicable law, the Company, on its own behalf and on behalf of its Affiliates and its and their respective licensors and service providers, expressly disclaims all warranties, whether express, implied, statutory or otherwise, with respect to the Service...

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, You can contact us by email.

AdGallery.title: Ad Library
AdGallery.description: Browse successful ads for inspiration and competitive analysis.

QuickActions.title: Pack Actions
QuickActions.description: Launch your next hunt for winning products.

finder.label: Find Winning Products
finder.description: Let AI analyze our ad database.

generate.label: Generate Ad Concepts

MarketSnapshot.description: Get a quick analysis of any product category.

adText.placeholder: Enter the full text content of your ad...

adVisual.uploadText: Click to upload or drag and drop

loading.title: AI wolf is on the hunt...
loading.description: Analyzing thousands of data points to find gold.

toast.successDescription: Your new ad concepts are ready.

productDescription.placeholder: Describe the key features and benefits of your product...

CopyResults.title: Generated Ad Concepts
CopyResults.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support the audio element.

toast.copyFailedDescription: Could not copy text to clipboard.

SpyPage.form.title: Analyze a Specific Competitor
SpyPage.form.description: Provide a direct link to a competitor's ad or product page. The AI will deconstruct their strategy and give you ways to counter it.

SpyPage.howItWorks.title: How does it work?
SpyPage.howItWorks.description: The AI draws upon its vast knowledge base of public web data to identify patterns, trends, and strategic insights. It analyzes the content, structure, and likely audience of the provided URL based on information learned during its training. It does not perform live browsing or access private data.

PlatformDistributionChart.title: Engagement Distribution
PlatformDistributionChart.description: Total engagement share by platform for the week.

CategoryPerformanceChart.title: Winning Category Performance
CategoryPerformanceChart.description: Average AI-estimated performance score for each identified category.
